text: Darius Gvildys (born 26 December 1970) is former football defender from Lithuania. He is currently working as head coach in his hometown club FC Stumbras. ==International career== Gvildys made 11 appearances for the Lithuania national football team between 1996 and 1999. ==References== * Category:1970 births Category:Living people Category:Lithuanian footballers Category:Lithuanian expatriate footballers Category:FBK Kaunas footballers Category:FK Liepājas Metalurgs players Category:Lithuania international footballers Category:FK Sūduva Marijampolė players Category:FC Lokomotiv Nizhny Novgorod players Category:FC Arsenal Tula players Category:Expatriate footballers in Russia Category:Russian Premier League players Category:Lithuanian football managers Category:FK Sūduva Marijampolė managers Category:FC Stumbras managers Category:Association football defenders
title: Darius Gvildys
